Field Documentation

VpsCore_Handle VpsDrv_DispInstObj_t::coreHandle

Core handle.

VpsCore_Inst VpsDrv_DispInstObj_t::coreInstObj

Core instance object used in core open.

const VpsCore_Ops* VpsDrv_DispInstObj_t::coreOps

Core function pointers.

UInt32 VpsDrv_DispInstObj_t::dispHeight

Height of the display at the VENC in linesto which the display driver path is connected.

UInt32 VpsDrv_DispInstObj_t::dispWidth

Width of the display at the VENC in pixels to which the display driver path is connected.

UInt32 VpsDrv_DispInstObj_t::drvInstId

Instance ID.

UInt32 VpsDrv_DispInstObj_t::isPrevBufRep

Flag to check if previous buffer is repeated.

UInt32 VpsDrv_DispInstObj_t::standard

VENC Standard like NTSC, 1080p etc to which the display driver path is connected. For valid values see FVID2_Standard.

UInt32 VpsDrv_DispInstObj_t::vencId

Venc ID to which this display instance is connected.
